text.section: In speaking of any partners, joint tenants, heirs, tenants in common, or trustees, a charging document may name any one of them and speak of them as the named person and another or others, as the case may be.

In stating the ownership or possession of real or personal property owned or possessed by two or more persons, a charging document may name one of the persons and lay the ownership or possession in the named person and another or others, as the case may be.
